description: Creates a parallel data resource in Amazon Translate by importing an input file from Amazon S3. Parallel data files contain examples that show how you want segments of text to be translated. By adding parallel data, you can influence the style, tone, and word choice in your translation output.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: A custom name for the parallel data resource in Amazon Translate. You must assign a name that is unique in the account and region.

parameters.name: ParallelDataConfig
parameters.description: Specifies the format and S3 location of the parallel data input file. S3Uri (string) --- The URI of the Amazon S3 folder that contains the parallel data input file. The folder must be in the same Region as the API endpoint you are calling. Format (string) --- The format of the parallel data input file.

nested_params.name: S3Uri
nested_params.description: The URI of the Amazon S3 folder that contains the parallel data input file. The folder must be in the same Region as the API endpoint you are calling.

nested_params.name: Format
nested_params.description: The format of the parallel data input file.

parameters.name: EncryptionKey
parameters.description: The encryption key used to encrypt this object. The type of encryption key used by Amazon Translate to encrypt this object. The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the encryption key being used to encrypt this object.

nested_params.name: Type
nested_params.description: The type of encryption key used by Amazon Translate to encrypt this object.

nested_params.name: Id
nested_params.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the encryption key being used to encrypt this object.

parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the request. This token is automatically generated when you use Amazon Translate through an AWS SDK. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: Tags to be associated with this resource. A tag is a key-value pair that adds metadata to a resource. Each tag key for the resource must be unique. For more information, see Tagging your resources. (dict) --- A key-value pair that adds as a metadata to a resource used by Amazon Translate. The initial part of a key-value pair that forms a tag associated with a given resource. The second part of a key-value pair that forms a tag associated with a given resource.

nested_params.name: Key
nested_params.description: The initial part of a key-value pair that forms a tag associated with a given resource.

nested_params.name: Value
nested_params.description: The second part of a key-value pair that forms a tag associated with a given resource.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The custom name that you assigned to the parallel data resource.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the parallel data resource. When the resource is ready for you to use, the status is ACTIVE.
